# ======================
# SETUP
# ======================

# Install packages
```install.packages(c("tidyverse", "modeldata")) 
```

# Load libraries
```   
library(tidyverse)
library(modeldata)
```


# ======================
# DATA LOADING
# ======================

# Load dataset
```
data(crickets)
```

# Quick inspection
```
head(crickets)
str(crickets)
view(crickets)
```


# ======================
# VISUALIZATIONS
# ======================

# ----------------------
# Original Scatterplots 
# ----------------------

# Colored by species with smooth lines
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=temp, y=rate, color=species, fill=species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x="Temperature", y="Chirp rate", color="Species",
       title="Cricket chirps", caption="Source: McDonald (2009)") +
  scale_color_brewer(palette="Dark2") 
```

# Modified point aesthetics
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=temp, y=rate)) +
  geom_point(color="red", size=2.5, alpha=.3, shape="square") +
  labs(x="Temperature", y="Chirp rate", 
       title="Cricket chirps", caption="Source: McDonald (2009)")
```       

# With smoothing
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=temp, y=rate)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(x="Temperature", y="Chirp rate", 
       title="Cricket chirps", caption="Source: McDonald (2009)")
```

# Linear model
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=temp, y=rate)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE) +
  labs(x="Temperature", y="Chirp rate", 
       title="Cricket chirps", caption="Source: McDonald (2009)")
```

# By species with linear models
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=temp, y=rate, color=species)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE) +
  labs(x="Temperature", y="Chirp rate", color="Species",
       title="Cricket chirps", caption="Source: McDonald (2009)") +
  scale_color_brewer(palette="Dark2") 
```


# ----------------------
# Original Distribution Plots 
# ----------------------

# Histogram
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=rate)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=15)
  ```

# Frequency polygon
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=rate)) +
  geom_freqpoly(bins=15)
```

# Bar plot
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=species)) +
  geom_bar(color="blue", fill="lightblue")
  ```

# Colored bar plot
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=species, fill=species)) +
  geom_bar(show.legend=FALSE) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette="Dark2")
```

# Boxplot
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=species, y=rate, color=species)) +
  geom_boxplot(show.legend=FALSE) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette="Dark2") +
  theme_minimal()
```


# ----------------------
# Original Faceted Plots
# ----------------------

# Histogram by species (overlaid)
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=rate, fill=species)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=15) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette="Dark2") 
```

# Histogram by species (faceted)
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=rate)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=15) +
  facet_wrap(~species)
```  

# Faceted with custom columns
```
ggplot(crickets, aes(x=rate, fill=species)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=15, show.legend=FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~species, ncol=1) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette="Dark2")
```
